1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Another day of auditions for Marcuss's indie film Torn Up. It's the new intern Nick's first day, several actors audition for the role of 16 year old gay farm boy Jimmy, Natalie West gets a call-back for the part of Grandma.

2.title: On the Fence
2.plot: Marcuss is "on the fence" about an actor they want to see for the role of the gay Farmhand. Tina has a past with one of the actors who comes in to audition. Carol trains Nick how to do her job.

imdb.plot outline: BAD SIDES is a new mockumentary comedy series from creators Nathan Adloff, Danny Rhodes and Justin D.M. Palmer, starring Adloff, Rhodes, and Sadieh Rifai. The story centers around Marcuss (Rhodes), a spoiled trust fund wannabe amateur filmmaker and Marcuss's adoring sycophant friend Allison (Rifai) during their ongoing quest to cast his film. Dissatisfied with the available talent pool in Chicago, their new intern Nick (Adloff) quickly discovers that the problem might have less to do with the talent of the actors, and more to do with the crazy people running the auditions. Shot on location in Chicago, with a story that takes place in Chicago, starring Chicago's very best talent, each episode of Bad Sides features a cameo guest star spot that serves as the thematic focus of that week's episode.
imdb.title: Bad Sides
plot: A show about a spoiled trust fund wannabe amateur filmmaker, his team and the ongoing quest to cast his indie film.::Palmer, Justin

BAD SIDES is a new mockumentary comedy series from creators Nathan Adloff, Danny Rhodes and Justin D.M. Palmer, starring Adloff, Rhodes, and Sadieh Rifai. The story centers around Marcuss (Rhodes), a spoiled trust fund wannabe amateur filmmaker and Marcuss's adoring sycophant friend Allison (Rifai) during their ongoing quest to cast his film. Dissatisfied with the available talent pool in Chicago, their new intern Nick (Adloff) quickly discovers that the problem might have less to do with the talent of the actors, and more to do with the crazy people running the auditions. Shot on location in Chicago, with a story that takes place in Chicago, starring Chicago's very best talent, each episode of _Bad Sides_ (qv) features a cameo guest star spot that serves as the thematic focus of that week's episode.::Palmer, Justin
